Demultiplex raw sequencing data

## Example commands

You can run the pipeline using `nextflow run`.

### View help

You can use `--help` as a parameter to get an overview of the possible parameters.

```bash
nextflow run czbiohub/utilities \
  -r main_build -latest \
  -main-script target/nextflow/demux/spaceranger_mkfastq/main.nf \
  --help
```

### Run command

<details>
<summary>Example of `params.yaml`</summary>
```yaml

```
</details>

```bash
nextflow run czbiohub/utilities \
  -r main_build -latest \
  -profile docker \
  -main-script target/nextflow/demux/spaceranger_mkfastq/main.nf \
  -params-file params.yaml
```

:::{.callout-note}
Replace `-profile docker` with `-profile podman` or `-profile singularity` depending on the desired backend.
:::

## Argument group

### Arguments

|Name             |Description                           |Attributes                                     |
|:----------------|:-------------------------------------|:----------------------------------------------|
|`--input`        |Path to the untarred BCL files.       |`file`, required, example: `"/path/to/bcl"`    |
|`--sample_sheet` |The path to the sample sheet.         |`file`, example: `"SampleSheet.csv"`           |
|`--output`       |The folder to store the demux results |`file`, required, example: `"/path/to/output"` |
